channel.description: Recent content in NYS:CAH on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Cardinal Health Sells $1 Billion of Bonds for Solaris Deal
item.description: Cardinal Health Inc. sold $1 billion of investment-grade bonds Wednesday to help fund the planned acquisition of Solaris Health that was unveiled just a day earlier.

item.title: Cardinal Health Sells $1 Billion of Bonds for Solaris Deal
item.description: Cardinal Health Inc. sold $1 billion of investment-grade bonds Wednesday to help fund the planned acquisition of Solaris Health that was unveiled just a day earlier.

item.title: Cardinal Health Starts High-Grade Bond Sale to Fund Solaris Deal
item.description: Cardinal Health Inc. plans to sell bonds in the US investment-grade primary market on Wednesday to help fund its acquisition of Solaris Health.

item.title: Cardinal Health Starts High-Grade Bond Sale to Fund Solaris Deal
